purpose.summary: DDL script that creates the AUTHFRDS table in the CARDDEMO schema. The table stores authorization transaction details including card number, timestamp, merchant information, transaction amounts, and fraud indicators for fraud analysis. Primary key is composite on CARD_NUM and AUTH_TS.
purpose.business_context: Fraud detection and reporting for card authorization transactions in a demonstration (CARDDEMO) environment.

outputs.name: CARDDEMO.AUTHFRDS
outputs.description: Table storing authorization fraud details including card number (line 2), auth timestamp (line 3), transaction amount (line 12), fraud flag (line 24), and merchant details (lines 17-21).

business_rules.description: CARD_NUM and AUTH_TS form the primary key ensuring unique identification of each authorization record.
business_rules.logic_summary: PRIMARY KEY clause enforces uniqueness and non-nullability.

business_rules.description: CARD_NUM is mandatory for all records.
AUTH_TS is mandatory for all records.
